name: PokemonGo Map
description: Live visualization of all the Pokémon (with option to show gyms and pokéstops) in an area on Pokémon Go.

LOCATION.description: Location on which the map should be centered. This can be an address, co-ordinates or anything that Google Maps accepts.

STEP_COUNT.description: The number of steps to take.

EXTRA_ARGS.description: Any extra arguments that you want to pass to runserver.py.

BUILDPACK_URL.description: Internal variable to build with node and python
